hadiths.text: Abdullah bin Abi Awfa said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to recite a great deal of remembrance, engage little in idle talk, make the prayer long and keep the khutbah short, and he would not refrain from walking with a widow or poor person and tending to their needs

chapter.ara-name: بَابُ مَا يُسْتَحَبُّ مِنْ تَقْصِيرِ الْخُطْبَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What Is Recommended Regarding Shortening The Khutbah
